name: Dude vs Spaceship
description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Blow up spaceships - Nothing else to it

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Take flight and destroy the spaceships. An evil battleship is attacking the city. Fly above the clouds. Fight your way through a fleet of spaceships. Blow up bosses. Do whatever it takes to defend the city.

Controls

Movement – W A S D
Aim – Mouse
Shoot – Left Click
